model.expr:
max(end_offset{job="kubernetes_prod", app="market-data-updater-service-stable", topic="bloombergMarketData.spac.raw",partition="0"}) + 
max(end_offset{job="kubernetes_prod", app="market-data-updater-service-stable", topic="bloombergMarketData.spac.raw",partition="1"}) + 
max(end_offset{job="kubernetes_prod", app="market-data-updater-service-stable", topic="bloombergMarketData.spac.raw",partition="2"}) + 
max(end_offset{job="kubernetes_prod", app="market-data-updater-service-stable", topic="bloombergMarketData.spac.raw",partition="3"}) -
max(read_offset{job="kubernetes_prod", app="market-data-updater-service-stable", topic="bloombergMarketData.spac.raw",partition="0"}) -
max(read_offset{job="kubernetes_prod", app="market-data-updater-service-stable", topic="bloombergMarketData.spac.raw",partition="1"}) -
max(read_offset{job="kubernetes_prod", app="market-data-updater-service-stable", topic="bloombergMarketData.spac.raw",partition="2"}) -
max(read_offset{job="kubernetes_prod", app="market-data-updater-service-stable", topic="bloombergMarketData.spac.raw",partition="3"}) - 4
